required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nab-Paclitaxel in Patients With ER+/HER2- Recurrent Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Nab-Paclitaxel in Patients With ER+/HER2- Recurrent Metastatic Breast Cancer：a Multi-center Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a single-arm, open, multi-center clinical study of nab-paclitaxel as the therapy ER+/HER2- recurrent metastatic breast cancer。

primary_outcome.description: Defined as proportion of complete response and partial response according to RECIST 1.1 criteria.

secondary_outcome.description: Defined as proportion of complete response 、partial response and stable disease according to RECIST 1.1 criteria.
Calculated from the time the study drug was first administered to the first confirmation of disease progression or death (whichever occurs first)

intervention.description: nab-paclitaxel 125mg / m2, intravenous drip 30min, d1, 8, 21 days as a cycle, until the disease progresses or intolerable toxicity. According to the calculation results, the administered dose can be within ± 10% of the calculated dose.

overall_official.affiliation: Cancer Institute and Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
